short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays 3 "UL" texts in the screen corners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows 3 "UL" texts in the screen corners. The missing one is randomly chosen.

To avoid any inconvenience as those texts are shown on top of the current webpage, they're hidden when the mouse cursor is near (to close modals for instance).

Enjoy this awesome extension!



GitHub repository: https://github.com/florian-lefebvre/ul-extension
